name: Merry Maids of Charleston
address: 2470 Mall Dr Ste E, North Charleston, SC 29406, USA

reviews.author: Hebs Boughey
reviews.text: Taylor frm Merry Maids is absolutely wonderful! She’s always on time, courteous, and professional. She pays great attention to detail - every surface sparkles and the entire condo feels fresh and spotless after she’s done. I really appreciate how thorough and efficient she is, and how she takes pride in her work. It’s such a relief to come home to a clean, beautifully maintained space. Highly recommend her services to anyone looking for someone reliable and excellent at what she does!

reviews.author: Stephanie Staples
reviews.text: Timely booking and service! Emily did an amazing, thorough clean of our house! We’re excited for Merry Maids to come back already! Handled working around my dogs all day - and they loved the company!

reviews.author: Kevin Hymans
reviews.text: I couldn’t be more happy with the service we received from Merry Maids and Danielle, Rebecca, and Rosa in particular. They all went above and beyond what we were even expecting. Everything they cleaned was spotless and we continue to notice their touch on a daily basis. They were extremely pet friendly, and I know our dog can’t wait for their next visit. We will definitely be utilizing Merry Maids on a regular basis!

reviews.author: Chrissy Haynes
reviews.text: We loved Rosa! She was so kinda and professional and did a quick/spotless cleaning job. We will definitely be using this service again. I especially loved that they made our clean customizable to what was in our budget.

reviews.author: Liz Kline
reviews.text: "She is very sweet and did a great job on my home. She was more than willing to go over a few areas that needed a touch up. My husband was very pleased as well! She left my home with a fresh clean smell which was not overwhelming. Will most definitely use Merry Maids again and again!".
